name: happy dreams (virtualplaystudios)
description:
you have to escape hotel happy dreams before a creepy demon eat you. find keys to escape and stay alive in happy dreams.

(made by one person)

feel free to leave a comment.

you can support me by leaving a donation :)

controls
  • WASD to move
  • E to interact
  • SHIFT to run
  • mouse to look
updates
  • monster chase bug fix
  • new game over screen
how to install
  1. download the game
  2. extract the game
  3. open the happy dreams folder
  4. click on happy dreams.exe
  5. have fun
